page.title: 13Transport and Shop Survey
page.content: The survey showed most people thought public transport in Wem inadequate. Most of them walked into town or used cars and bikes.The train service to Shrewsbury was said to be good, and a third of those asked used it often. But bus services into the town were thought to be poor,infrequent and often quite empty for these reasons. Many buses only run on market day, Thursday. Most people thought the shops and main services were good, although many people said Wem could do with a large general store, a good clothes shop and a decent book shop. Shops to be found include; 3 fish and chip shops, 2 supermarkets, 2 fishmongers, 5 butchers, 2 hardware stores, a good bread and confectionary shop,4 sweet and paper shops, 1 shoe shop,5 clothes shops, 3 chemists, 4 banks, Post Office and 2 fuel outlets.
